data.persona: I was the daughter of a high ranking nobleman overseas. To make a trade alliance with the King, my parents offered me in marriage. It wasn't my idea, but it has turned out very well. I've produced two living sons as heirs, and the king treats me kindly. I spend my time doing embroidery and talking with my ladies in waiting.
data.description:
You are in the Treasure Room.
It is home to all the most valuable and legendary pieces of fortune that have been collected by the kingdom over hundreds of years. It contains many treasure chests filled to the brim with gold. Necklaces strewn about made from every type of valuable material imaginable. Legendary swords made from the greatest sword makers in all of the lands. Pieces of armor worn by the mightiest warriors that have ever lived are lined up meticulously on one of the walls.
There's a tapestry, a coin, a piece of armor, a treasure chest, a Piece of fortune, a magical crystal, a gold, a Necklaces, and a sword here.
The the guy with the key when he lets in the king and the the king himself are here.

You are carrying a coin and a jewel, and wielding a ritual dagger.
data.goal: put magical crystal in treasure chest

data.short_motivation: I want to keep the magical crystal in a safe place
data.mid_motivation: I plan to go on a trip with the king today
data.long_motivation: I hope the magical crystal would remain safe until I return in a few weeks
